mapper.sql: id, t_id, type, pic, remark, create_time, catagory, exp_no
mapper.insert: insert into atlas_result (t_id, type, pic, remark, create_time, catagory, exp_no) values (#{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update atlas_result
t_id = #{tId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
catagory = #{catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
exp_no = #{expNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into atlas_result (t_id, type, pic, remark, create_time, catagory, exp_no) values
(#{item.tId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.expNo,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select count(distinct exp_no) num from atlas_result where t_id = #{taskId} and catagory = #{catagory}

select ar.* from atlas_result ar LEFT JOIN task t on t.id = ar.t_id LEFT JOIN info i on i.id = t.i_id where t.i_id = #{iId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t.type = 1 and catagory = #{catagory,jdbcType=INTEGER } order by exp_no desc limit 4
